title.narrative: Supporting distance learning in the areas affected by the explosion in Lebanon (Quodrat).

description.narrative: 1- Training of trainers and teachers on education 2- Providing teachers with electronic devices to facilitate training and education 3- Providing psychosocial support to local communities by supporting 100 public schools affected by the Beirut explosion. 4- Create online curricula for distance learning and blended learning targeting teachers, including the following: Foundations of distance learning and blended learning.
An educational project in cooperation with the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO) to support schools affected by the explosion in Lebanon .

Strengthening educational capacities to reach children and support the distance education process in the communities affected by the explosion of the Port of Beirut to ensure the continuity of education, with a special focus on building teachers’ skills, capabilities and resilience.
